name: Quam - Jump&Run
description:
This is my first project. I used only free assets and i draw myself some basic lighting animations. I'm very new into these stuff. 

For now i build only two levels. Design and building stages are really exhausting an overwhelming for me. But i beleive i can make it up to ten levels in a month. Then if i can make some money i will try to add new mechanics like item and item market. Then you can purchase items with your diamonds. I really need to hear some feedback. Thanks.
